Rodenpicula:
My young heir, I am the bane of the goddess of light. Together, we have defeated her messenger. Thanks to your help, I may now watch over you a little longer. We were created by the Giants as weapons to oppose the gods... But though you are my descendant, you are free to choose a different destiny than mine. I envy you -- I should very much like to see what the future brings... ... Now, take this.
